list.name: Changes
list.comment: - Merged Chapter 1 with the Abstract decreasing the numbers of all subsequent chapters by 1 - Turned old Chapter 2 into a new introduction and removed some redundancy - moved some misplaced content from the Information exchange chapter into the new introduction further removing redundancy - massive improvements to the information exchange chapter by adding far more precise descriptions of the process - Integrated more references into the first chapters

task.summary: - add more and better sources to .bib file and add them to the new reference section - comment out the old placeholder reference section - add placeholder for a paragraph about AI-based anomaly detection

- overall improvements to the section about security measures - removed the old section containing references entirely - added paragraph about AI-based anomaly detection - added section with conclusion
- improvements on chapter 4 - added a graph comparing speed, security and efficiency of vanilla BGP and BGP with additional security measures - added a reference concerning BGP hijacking basics

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: - improvements on chapter 4 - added a graph comparing speed, security and efficiency of vanilla BGP and BGP with additional security measures - added a reference concerning BGP hijacking basics

task.summary: - roughly doubled the amount of references in the .bib file - removed the last few subpar wikipedia references and replaced them with high quality sources like original protocol definitions - started integrating the references into the actual text - minor improvements to chapter 5
